org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.distmap

Class DistmapEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.distmap.DistmapEncoder

  • public final class DistmapEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for encode/decode GATKRead to the Distmap format. Distmap ( Pandey & Schl√∂tterer 2013) is a wrapper around different mappers for distributed computation using Hadoop. The input for this tool is a modified FASTQ format which is written in HDFS to save space and to distribute easily pair-end reads. It is a tab-delimited format with the following fields: 1. Read name with '@' symbol included. 2. Read sequence. 3. Read quality. 4. Second read sequence (if pair-end). 5. Second read quality (if pair-end).

        Encodes a pair-end read into a Distmap string.
        Parameters:
        pair - tuple with the first and the second reads in the pair.
        Throws:
        DistmapException - if the pairs have different names.

      • isPaired

        public static final boolean isPaired(java.lang.String distmapString)
        Checks if a Distmap String represents paired or unpaired data.
        Parameters:
        distmapString - the string encoded in the Distmap format.
        Returns:
        true if it is paired; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        DistmapException - if the String is not properly formatted.

      • decodeSingle

        public static final org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead decodeSingle(java.lang.String distmapSingleString)
        Decodes a single-end Distmap String.
        Parameters:
        distmapSingleString - the string encoded in the Distmap format.
        Returns:
        read using the FastqGATKRead implementation.
        Throws:
        DistmapException - if the String is not properly formatted.
        See Also:
        FastqGATKRead

      • decodePaired

        public static final scala.Tuple2<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead,org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead> decodePaired(java.lang.String distmapPairedString)
        Decodes a pair-end Distmap String.
        Parameters:
        distmapPairedString - the string encoded in the Distmap format.
        Returns:
        pair of reads using the FastqGATKRead implementation. The flags are set to be first and second of pair.
        Throws:
        DistmapException - if the String is not properly formatted.
        See Also:
        FastqGATKRead
